EditText.android:text: Now that you have the app and are signed in, here are the basics. If the current activity is blank (i.e. you cannot find your device) be sure to enable bluetooth so that we can communicate with the Javelin device, we need proper permission to continue. If the device still does not show up, try to shake the device to 'wake' it up. Next click on your personal device to continue to our punching activity and begin punching! Your profile is autogenerated to have a maximum punching power (actually pressure measured in PSI) of zero. Don't worry, once you start punching, PSI readings will be taken and shown on the screen. Your best punch will also be recorded and shown as well. Additionally, we wil show the acceleration of your punches (measured in meters per second squared). Functionality for kicks, elbows, and knees are coming soon!
